p: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.
q: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.
w: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking and briefly revealing enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.
e: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.
r: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.

blurd: Lucian, a Sentinel of Light, is a grim hunter of undying spirits, pursuing them relentlessly and annihilating them with his twin relic pistols. After the wraith Thresh slew his wife, Lucian embarked on the path of vengeance—but even with her return to...
name: Lucian
title: the Purifier
